ShowMaterialDescription.Name: Show Material Components Description
ShowMaterialDescription.Hint: Display the full description of material components in spell tooltips (e.g. 'diamonds worth 300gp, which the spell consumes')

EnforceSpellPreparationPC.Name: Enforce Spell Preparation (Linked Tokens)
EnforceSpellPreparationPC.Hint: When enabled, linked tokens (including player characters) will only show prepared spells and special spells (innate, at-will, pact, ritual, always). When disabled, all spells will appear.

EnforceSpellPreparationNPC.Name: Enforce Spell Preparation (Unlinked Tokens)
EnforceSpellPreparationNPC.Hint: When enabled, unlinked tokens will only show prepared spells and special spells (innate, at-will, pact, ritual, always). When disabled, all spells will appear.

BR.Name: Bonus & Reaction active effects
BR.Hint: Set Bonus Action and Reaction as used based on MidiQoL active effects.

ADV.Name: Add Advantage/Disadvantage buttons
ADV.Hint: Add an advantage or disadvantage source. Need MidiQoL fast forward to be enable.
